True Comfort Bistro Bliss: Elevating your dining experience with exceptional cuisine and a cozy atmosphere ↗ ↗ See our services Based in India Together Over a Cup of Success Seamless Teamwork Over Coffee At BistroBliss, we believe that collaboration is the key to success. Our team works closely with customers, ensuring open communication and a strong partnership over every delightful dish. Shared vision At BistroBliss, we believe that collaboration is the key to success. Our team works closely with customers, ensuring open communication and a strong partnership over every delightful dish. We align our strategies with your goals, fostering a collaborative environment where your vision and our expertise come together to create exceptional experiences. Trust Through Openness Clear communication At BistroBliss, we believe that trust is built through openness. Our team is dedicated to creating a transparent and welcoming atmosphere where customers feel valued and heard. By fostering open communication and genuine connections, we ensure that every visit to BistroBliss is a memorable experience. Accountability BistroBliss takes responsibility for every aspect of our work. We are committed to transparency in our operations, ensuring that you can trust us to deliver on our promises with integrity and accountability. Gallery At Conduct Our mission To delight coffee lovers by offering innovative brews, cozy ambiance, and exceptional service that create memorable experiences and lasting joy. Our vision To be a leading café recognized for our exceptional coffee, inviting ambiance, and dedication to providing unforgettable moments for every guest Values We uphold the highest standards of quality in all our brews, fostering trust and satisfaction with our guests. We are committed to continuous innovation in every cup Get in touch Your message was sent, thank you! pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy .privacy-container { text-align: center; max-width: 1000px; margin: 50px auto; padding: 20px; background-color: #fff; border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 0; } .privacy-container > h1, .privacy-container > h2 { text-align: center; color: #2c3e50; } .privacy-container > h1 { font-size: 2.5em; margin-bottom: 20px; } .privacy-container > h2 { font-size: 1.8em; margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; margin: 2% auto; } .privacy-container > p { line-height: 1.6; margin: 0 auto; text-align: center; } @media (max-width: 600px) { .privacy-container { padding: 15px; } .privacy-container > h1 { font-size: 2em; } .privacy-container > h2 { font-size: 1.5em; } } .home-hero-section { margin-bottom: 0; height: auto; } BistroBliss Home About Contact × Home About Contact Privacy Policy Welcome to our café's website. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect and how we use, disclose, and protect that information. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information when you make a purchase or sign up for our newsletter. We also collect non-personal information such as your browser type, IP address, and browsing behavior on our site. How We Use Your Information We use your personal information to process transactions, provide customer service, and send promotional materials. Non-personal information is used to improve our website's functionality and user experience. Disclosure of Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except as necessary to provide our services or comply with the law. We may share information with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business. Security We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the date of the latest revision will be indicated at the top of the page. BistroBliss Terms Conditions Privacy Policy © 2024. All Rights Reserved.
pages.terms-condition: Terms and Conditions terms-container { max-width: 800px; margin: 50px auto; background-color: #fff; border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 0; } .terms-container > h1, .terms-container > h2 { color: #2c3e50; } .terms-container > h1 { text-align: center; font-size: 2.5em; margin-bottom: 20px; } .terms-container > h2 { text-align: center; font-size: 1.8em; margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; margin: 0 auto; } .terms-container > p { line-height: 1.6; margin: 0 auto; text-align: center; } @media (max-width: 600px) { .terms-container { padding: 15px; } .terms-container > h1 { font-size: 2em; } .terms-container > h2 { font-size: 1.5em; } } .home-hero-section { margin-bottom: 0; height: auto; } BistroBliss Home About Contact × Home About Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to our café's website. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services. Use of Website You agree to use our website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the website. Prohibited behavior includes, but is not limited to, harassing or causing distress or inconvenience to any other user, transmitting obscene or offensive content, or disrupting the normal flow of dialogue within our website. Intellectual Property All content included on this website, such as text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of our café or our content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. Unauthorized use of any content on this website may violate copyright, trademark, and other laws. Limitation of Liability Our café will not be liable for any damages arising out of or in connection with the use of this website. This includes, without limitation, direct loss, loss of business or profits (whether or not the loss of such profits was foreseeable), damage caused to your computer, computer software, systems, and programs, and the data thereon or any other direct or indirect, consequential, and incidental damages. Changes to These Terms We reserve the right to update these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the date of the latest revision will be indicated at the top of the page. Your continued use of the website following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes. BistroBliss Terms Conditions Privacy Policy © 2024. All Rights Reserved.
